Title: Baby
Plot: Capeside is abuzz with rumors of a teacher's indiscretion, rumors that prove fateful for Pacey and Tamera. Meanwhile, Joey and Jen get a life lesson when Bessie is aided by an unlikely source when she gives birth in Dawson's living room.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Violence, coarse language and sexual references
Writer: Jon Harmon Feldman, Joanne T. Waters
GuestStars: Obi Ndefo, Dylan Neal, Leann Hunley, Christopher Berry, Chris Blackwelder, Josh Crouch, Dorothy Recasner Brown, Traci Dinwiddie, David Lenthall
